item.title: dario add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "No es ningún mérito sufrir" -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: dario add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: dario add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Olvidar un hecho, es modificar el pasado." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: dario add a quote by Samuel Johnson
item.description: "My congratulations to you, sir. Your manuscript is both good and original; but the part that is good is not original, and the part that is original is not good. " -- Samuel Johnson

item.title: dario add a quote by Samuel Johnson
item.description: "I never desire to converse with a man who has written more than he has read." -- Samuel Johnson

item.title: dario add a quote by Samuel Johnson
item.description: "You raise your voice when you should reinforce your argument." -- Samuel Johnson

item.title: dario add a quote by Samuel Johnson
item.description: "Curiosity is, in great and generous minds, the first passion and the last." -- Samuel Johnson

item.title: dario add a quote by Samuel Johnson
item.description: "Justice is my being allowed to do whatever I like. Injustice is whatever prevents my doing so." -- Samuel Johnson

item.title: dario add a quote by Samuel Johnson
item.description: "A writer only begins a book. A reader finishes it." -- Samuel Johnson

item.title: dario add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: dario add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: dario add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "Everything we hear is an opinion, not a fact. Everything we see is a perspective, not the truth." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: dario add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injury." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: dario add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "Our life is what our thoughts make it." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: dario add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "The object of life is not to be on the side of the majority, but to escape finding oneself in the ranks of the insane." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: dario add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself in your way of thinking." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: dario add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "If someone is able to show me that what I think or do is not right, I will happily change, for I seek the truth, by which no one was ever truly harmed. It is the person who continues in his self-deception and ignorance who is harmed." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: dario add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "How much more grievous are the consequences of anger than the causes of it." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: dario add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "The best revenge is not to be like your enemy." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: dario add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "Remember that very little is needed to make a happy life." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: dario add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "Receive without conceit, release without struggle." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: dario add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "Do every act of your life as though it were the very last act of your life." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: dario add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: dario add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: dario add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: dario add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream." -- Edgar Allan Poe
